plot: On a cross-country road trip, three college graduates choose to stay the night in an abandoned cabin only to find that, in the middle of nowhere, they are not alone.
title: Schattenkind
plot_es: On a cross-country road trip, three college graduates choose to stay the night in an abandoned cabin only to find that, in the middle of nowhere, they are not alone.
plot_en: On a cross-country road trip, three college graduates choose to stay the night in an abandoned cabin only to find that, in the middle of nowhere, they are not alone.
